name: Twin Stick Shooter Game
description:
Description:  A multiplayer game in a Twin Stick Shooter style, where you will have to fight against your friends, to get a better score. But be careful, there are going to be some special enemies to make the fight between you and your friends more difficult. PC Controls: PlayerGameHorizontal Movement:  A / D

Vertical Movement:  W / S

Turn: Mouse X-Axis

Dogde :  Space

Fire:  Left Mouse Button

Aim Assist:  Right Mouse Button
Join Lobby:  I

Assign Gamepad To Player 1:  0

Start Game:  C

Quit Game:  Esc

Pause Game:  P

Return To Lobby:  M Gamepad Controls: PlayerGameHorizontal Movement: 
Gamepad Left Thumbstick X-Axis

Vertical Movement: 
Gamepad Left Thumbstick Y-Axis

Turn Rate:
Gamepad Right Thumbstick X-Axis

Dogde : 
Gamepad Right Shoulder

Fire: 
Gamepad Right Trigger

Aim Assist: 
Gamepad Left ShoulderJoin Lobby: 
Right Special Button

Assign Gamepad To Player 1: 
Left Special Button

Start Game: 
Gamepad Face Button Botton

Pause Game: 
Right Special Button

Return To Lobby: 
Left Special Button
Player & Enemies

  

Weapons  Normal Weapons

 

Special Weapon Healing Point
